subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Svetlana Kuznetsova ended Maria Sharapova’s winning streak at 18 matches Friday night with a 6-3, 5-7, 6-2 victory in the Pacific Life Open semifinals in Indian Wells, Calif.Sharapova’s perfect start to the season included titles in the Australian Open and at Doha.Kuznetsova, refusing to wilt after Sharapova won the second set, broke her service in the opening game of the third and went on to build a 5-1 lead. Kuznetsova will face No. 2 Ana Ivanovic in Sunday’s final. Ivanovic earned her spot with a 7-6 (3), 6-3 victory over Jelena Jankovic.On the men’s side, Mardy Fish, who had never made it beyond the fourth round at Indian Wells, added to his string of surprises in this year’s tournament with a 6-3, 6-7 (5), 7-6 (4) victory over David Nalbandian. The win over No. 7 Nalbandian put the 98th-ranked Fish into Saturday’s semifinals, where he will face No. 1 Roger Federer.
